item.title: 日本敦促美国尽快实施汽车关税削减措施
item.description: 日本政府周四表示，日本最高贸易谈判代表赤泽亮世要求美国迅速执行双边贸易协议中达成的措施，包括降低汽车和汽车零部件关税。【原文：Japan's top trade negotiator Ryosei Akazawa requested that the U.S. swiftly implement measures agreed upon in a bilateral trade deal, including lowering automobile and auto parts tariffs, Japan's government said on Thursday.】

item.title: 备忘录显示派拉蒙联席首席执行官罗宾斯将卸任
item.description: 根据路透社周三看到的一份备忘录，帮助派拉蒙+流媒体服务发展壮大的布莱恩-罗宾斯（Brian Robbins）在派拉蒙全球与 Skydance Media 合并完成后，将辞去派拉蒙全球联席首席执行官一职。【原文：Brian Robbins, who helped grow the Paramount+ streaming service, is stepping down as Paramount Global's co-CEO, according to a memo seen by Reuters on Wednesday, following the completion of its merger with Skydance Media.】

item.title: 大都会人寿的利润因承保利润率下降而下滑
item.description: 大都会人寿周三公布的第二季度调整后利润下降了 16%，原因是保费下降抵消了投资收益增加带来的收益。【原文：MetLife posted a 16% fall in second-quarter adjusted profit on Wednesday, as weaker premiums offset gains from higher investment income.】

item.title: 新加坡星展银行第二季度净利润增长 1%，超出预期
item.description: 新加坡最大的银行星展集团周四公布，由于总收入增加，第二季度净利润同比增长 1%。【原文：DBS Group , Singapore's biggest bank, on Thursday posted a 1% rise in net profit in the second quarter from a year earlier on the back of higher total income.】

item.title: 能源转让公司称，美国限制乙烷供应将增加与中国签订合同的难度
item.description: 美国乙烷出口商Energy Transfer公司周三表示，尽管美国最近取消了对中国出口乙烷的限制，但这可能会增加与中国公司签订合同的难度。【原文：Recent U.S. restrictions on ethane exports to China will likely make it more difficult to contract with Chinese companies, even though they have already been lifted, U.S. exporter Energy Transfer said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 特朗普称可能就俄罗斯石油对中国征收更多关税，类似于对印度征税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周三表示，他可能会宣布对中国进一步征收关税，类似于早些时候因印度购买俄罗斯石油而宣布对印度征收25%关税的做法，这取决于事态的发展。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Wednesday said he could announce further tariffs on China similar to the 25% duties announced earlier on India over its purchases of Russian oil, depending on what happens.】

item.title: 苹果公司称将与三星合作，从德州工厂获得新芯片技术
item.description: 苹果公司周三表示，它正与三星电子在后者位于得克萨斯州的芯片生产厂合作，"推出一种创新的芯片制造新技术"。【原文：Apple said on Wednesday it is working with Samsung Electronics at the latter's chip production plant in Texas to "to launch an innovative new technology for making chips."】

item.title: 竞争加剧，通用汽车与现代汽车签署首份联合开发五款汽车的协议
item.description: 通用汽车公司和现代汽车公司周三宣布，双方首次达成了联合开发五款汽车的协议。【原文：General Motors and Hyundai Motor announced on Wednesday their first agreement to jointly develop five vehicles.】

item.title: 特朗普称已启动美联储职位面试程序，人选缩减至 3 个
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周三表示，他已开始对美联储理事会一个空缺职位的候选人进行面试，并称候选人名单可能只剩下三个选择。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Wednesday he had started the process of interviewing candidates for an open position on the Federal Reserve's Board of Governors and said the candidate pool was probably down to three choices .】

item.title: 由于成本增加，CF 工业公司季度利润低于预期；股价下跌
item.description: CF 工业公司周三公布的第二季度利润不及预期，成本上升对该化肥公司造成压力，导致其股价在盘后交易中下跌 4.3%。【原文：CF Industries missed estimates for second-quarter profit on Wednesday, as higher costs weighed on the fertilizer firm, sending its shares down 4.3% in extended trading.】

item.title: 由于植物性食品需求疲软，Beyond Meat 的季度收入低于预期
item.description: 本周三，Beyond Meat 公司第二季度营收不及华尔街预期，原因是在宏观经济持续不确定的情况下，美国市场对其植物肉类产品的需求疲软。【原文：Beyond Meat missed Wall Street estimates for second-quarter revenue on Wednesday, hurt by weak demand for its plant-based meat products in the U.S. amid ongoing macroeconomic uncertainty.】

item.title: BRF 的沙特投资者称对管理层没有影响力
item.description: 沙特农牧业投资公司的全资子公司 SALIC 国际投资公司周三告诉巴西竞争管理机构，它是竞争对手 BRF 和 Minerva 两家食品生产商的被动小股东。【原文：SALIC International Investment Company, a wholly-owned subsidiary of Saudi Agricultural and Livestock Investment Company, told Brazilian competition authorities on Wednesday it is a passive minority shareholder in rival food producers BRF and Minerva .】

item.title: 特朗普称美国将对半导体进口征收约 100%的关税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周三表示，美国将对进口到该国的半导体芯片征收约 100%的关税。【原文：The United States will impose a tariff of about 100% on semiconductor chips imported into the country, President Donald Trump said on Wednesday.】

item.title: Firefly Aerospace 将为美国首次公开募股定价，以实现积极的升空目标
item.description: 诺斯罗普-格鲁曼公司（Northrop Grumman）支持的萤火虫宇航公司（Firefly Aerospace）是一家热闹非凡的太空技术初创公司，曾将着陆器送上月球。【原文：Northrop Grumman-backed Firefly Aerospace, the buzzy space technology startup that put a lander on the moon, is set to price its U.S. IPO later on Wednesday.】

item.title: Mckesson 因特药需求强劲而上调年度利润预期
item.description: 美国药品分销商麦克森公司（McKesson）周三上调了年度利润预期，并超过了华尔街的盈利预期，这主要得益于对特殊药品的强劲需求。【原文：U.S. drug distributor McKesson raised its annual profit forecast and beat Wall Street earnings estimates on Wednesday, banking on robust demand for specialty medicines.】

item.title: 受贸易不确定性影响，Fortinet 预计第三季度销售额低于预期
item.description: Fortinet 周三预测第三季度营收低于华尔街预期，原因是全球贸易紧张局势引发的宏观经济不确定性普遍存在，企业削减了开支，导致股价在盘后交易中下跌 12%。【原文：Fortinet forecast third-quarter revenue below Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, as businesses cut back on spending amid widespread macroeconomic uncertainty stemming from global trade tensions, sending shares down 12% in extended trading.】

item.title: 美国加征关税前夕，巴西 7 月牛肉出口创历史新高
item.description: 周三的贸易数据显示，7月份巴西新鲜牛肉的出口量达到创纪录的27.69万吨，这表明在美国对这个全球最大出口国的销售征收巨额关税之前，巴西牛肉的出口量急剧上升。【原文：Exports of fresh beef from Brazil reached a record 276,900 metric tons in July, according to trade data on Wednesday, showing a steep rise before a hefty U.S. tariff applied on sales from the world's biggest exporter.】

item.title: 顶级钾肥生产商 Nutrien 第二季度利润超出预期
item.description: 本周三，Nutrien 公司的第二季度利润超过了华尔街的预期，因为这家世界顶级的钾肥生产商受益于北美玉米种植季节的强劲需求。【原文：Nutrien beat Wall Street estimates for second-quarter profit on Wednesday, as the world's top potash producer benefited from improved demand in North America amid a robust corn planting season.】

item.title: 交易日：华尔街势头平息关税震荡
item.description: 了解推动全球市场的各种力量【原文：Making sense of the forces driving global markets】

item.title: 保诚金融公司在美国联邦贸易委员会和解协议中支付 1 亿美元
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会与保德信金融公司达成了一项 1 亿美元的和解协议，以解决前部门误导消费者购买未提供其所承诺保险的医疗保健计划的指控。【原文：The U.S. Federal Trade Commission reached a $100 million settlement with Prudential Financial to resolve claims a former unit misled consumers into buying healthcare plans that did not provide the coverage it promised.】

item.title: 科培公司因支出恢复而公布季度利润增加
item.description: 商业支付公司 Corpay 周三公布，受企业和车辆支付部门增长的推动，第二季度利润有所增长。【原文：Business payments firm Corpay reported a rise in second-quarter profit on Wednesday, driven by growth in its corporate and vehicle payment divisions.】

item.title: 上半年业绩强劲，Corteva 上调年度利润和销售额预期
item.description: 美国农用化学品公司 Corteva 周三上调了年度调整后利润和销售预期，今年上半年业绩表现强劲，股价在延时交易中上涨了 6%。【原文：U.S. agrichemicals company Corteva raised its annual adjusted profit and sales forecast on Wednesday, following strong performance in the first half of the year, sending its shares 6% higher in extended trading.】

item.title: 苹果公司承诺向美国追加 1,000 亿美元投资
item.description: 苹果公司周三表示，它将在美国追加 1,000 亿美元的投资，使其在未来四年对美国的总投资承诺达到 6,000 亿美元。【原文：Apple said on Wednesday it would spend an additional $100 billion in U.S. investments, bringing its total investment commitment to the country to $600 billion over the next four years.】

item.title: 因人工智能需求驱动，Paycom 上调 2025 年收入和利润预期
item.description: 薪资处理商 Paycom Software 周三上调了年度收入和利润预期，因为人工智能功能的增加有助于加快员工管理服务的需求，这使得其股价在延时交易中上涨了 7%。【原文：Payroll processor Paycom Software raised its forecast for annual revenue and profit on Wednesday, as the addition of AI features helps accelerate demand for its employee management services, sending its shares up 7% in extended trading.】

item.title: 消息人士称，特朗普会见花旗集团和美国银行首席执行官讨论房利美和房地美问题
item.description: 据一位熟悉情况的消息人士透露，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周三在白宫会见了花旗集团首席执行官简-弗雷泽，讨论了政府对房利美和房地美的计划。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump met Citigroup CEO Jane Fraser at the White House on Wednesday to discuss the administration's plans for Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac, according to a source familiar with the situation.】

item.title: Elf Beauty 因平价口红和护肤品需求强劲，季度业绩超出预期
item.description: 精灵美容公司（Elf Beauty）周三公布的第一季度销售额和利润超出预期，主要原因是尽管零售业普遍放缓，但零售商和网络渠道对其价格低廉的产品（包括唇油和腮红）的需求依然强劲。【原文：Elf Beauty beat first-quarter sales and profit estimates on Wednesday, fueled by resilient demand for its affordable products including lip oils and blush tints at retailers and online channels, despite broader retail slowdown.】

item.title: 保险公司美国国际集团（AIG）承保实力增强，季度利润增加
item.description: 美国国际集团（American International Group）周三公布第二季度利润增长，主要得益于强劲的承保收益和较高的投资回报率。【原文：American International Group reported a higher second-quarter profit on Wednesday, powered by strong underwriting gains and higher returns on investments.】

item.title: 戴利表示，美联储可能需要在未来几个月内降息
item.description: 旧金山联邦储备银行行长玛丽-戴利（Mary Daly）周三以劳动力市场放缓和她认为关税仅对通胀构成短期威胁为由表示，她认为美国央行不久将需要降息。【原文：Citing a slowing labor market and her assessment that tariffs pose only a short-term threat to inflation, San Francisco Federal Reserve Bank President Mary Daly on Wednesday said she believes the U.S. central bank will need to cut interest rates soon.】

item.title: Doordash预计本季度业绩强劲，快递需求保持稳定
item.description: 本周三，Doordash 预测第三季度商品总值将高于华尔街预期，此前该公司的预测高于预期，并押注于通过其平台进行食品和杂货配送的强劲需求。【原文：Doordash forecast third-quarter gross merchandise value above Wall Street expectations after topping estimates on Wednesday, betting on robust demand for food and grocery deliveries through its platform.】

item.title: Bumble 第二季度营收超出预期，任命新首席财务官
item.description: Bumble 周三公布的第二季度营收高于华尔街预期，这款约会应用的扭亏为盈初见成效。【原文：Bumble on Wednesday posted second-quarter revenue above Wall Street estimates, as the dating app begins to bear early fruits from its turnaround efforts.】
